name: My first unamed unity game
description:
This is my first unity project. It's still not completed and probably contains more bugs than π's digits. feel free to try out what I was trying to make and of course any feedback is highly appreciated.

 //PLAY IN FULLSCREEN\\

Controls :

MOVE :  L & R arrows

JUMP : SPACE

SWORD ATTACK : X

DASH :Z

FIREBALL C
